scenario_text.value:
Hey, Takuma. Ryo’s still freakin’ out about
that ghost.

Man, just when I was starting to think he’d
grown a spine. I guess that’s Ryo for you.

Well, about that... Apparently Saki noticed
some weird presence in the cafeteria too.
What? Seriously?

Still, I don’t know, I don’t see how it could
be a ghost.

We are coming up on the end of all this.
Maybe she’s just on edge?

(I get what Minoru’s saying, and I agree, but
Ryo and Saki’s reactions have me worried.)
(How should I reply to him?)
You think that’s all?
Yeah, maybe...
You think that’s all?

I don’t know, do you really think that’s all
there is to it?
What, are you saying you believe in ghosts?

If it was just Ryo, I could believe he was
seeing things, but with Saki too...

Do you really think they’re both jumping at
shadows?

I mean, that does seem weird... You think
there’s really a ghost out there?
That...I’m not so sure about.

*sigh*... You must be pretty on edge too,
Takuma.
Yeah, maybe...

Yeah, maybe that’s it. We are all pretty worn
out.
That’s what I’m sayin’.

There can’t really be a ghost out there. It’s
not like we’re in a comic book.

Though some monsters like Fangmon and
Archnemon seem like they could be in one.
That’s different.

Look, I’m sure we’ll all feel better after we
rest. Being on edge makes you see things.
Right, yeah, that’s probably it...

But even if it turns out to be nothing, it
couldn’t hurt to be on our guard, right?

That’s true. We’re coming up on the finish
line, so we should be careful we don’t slip.

*fidget* Ah, but before that, I better go
take a leak.
See you around, Takuma!
Uhh...yeah.
Man, have I got to take a leak.
